"Mobile Cannons":
"Mobile Cannons are powerful special weapons that can be summoned from Delivery Devices.

While equipped with one, you cannot access your normal weapons and gain a special dedicated moveset instead."

"Mobile Cannons have the following abilities:

Rapid Fire: A Normal Attack that can be fired continuously
Charge Blaster: A powerful charged shot that can only be used a limited number of times
Boost Glider: A high-speed movement action that costs PP
Step Bash: A melee strike that can also evade attacks"

"Each Mobile Cannon you use can only be equipped for a limited time. When you unequip a Mobile Cannon, your normal equipment will automatically be restored.

You can select \"Arms Release\" from your Subpalette to unequip it early, and it will also be unequipped if you are incapacitated."
